pages.title: Block Runes
pages.text: Craft through $(l:mechanics/5_ritual)ritual$(/l).$(br2)By infusing crystals with respective blocks, you can cast $(l:mechanics/1_nature_spell#block_spell_casting)block spells$(/l) directly without presence of those blocks.

pages.title: Spell Runes
pages.text: Craft through $(l:mechanics/5_ritual)ritual$(/l).$(br2)Standalone spell rune as an upgrade from block spells.$(br)Can cast $(9)advanced spells$() that has more variety and power.
